name: CSV Templates
description: Ready-to-fill CSV templates for staff, areas, products, and vendors to accelerate data entry.

prd.problemStatement: Bulk data entry is faster with CSV import than manual entry. Pre-formatted templates with examples speed up the import process.
goals: Provide CSV templates for key entities
userStories: As a new user, I want CSV templates so that I can quickly import bulk data
As a new user, I want example data so that I understand the expected format
